recently_narrative: The Zendesk ecosystem updates over the past 3 weeks highlight the company's continued focus on enhancing its AI-driven customer experience solutions, as seen through the announcement of features like WhatsApp Flows, Agent Copilot auto-assist, and improvements to email authentication and translation. However, these updates are accompanied by several service incidents, including performance degradation, workflow disruptions, and AI agent delays, suggesting that Zendesk is also grappling with stability and reliability issues as it races to integrate new technologies. This dual emphasis on innovation and addressing operational challenges likely presents both opportunities and complexities for Zendesk professionals, who must navigate the evolving platform while ensuring seamless customer experiences.

release_notes.summary: Copilot: auto assist can now suggest existing macros to agents. AI Agents Advanced: improved dialogue builder UI for hiding/disabling parameter branches.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
